ygData.subject: Re: Feign Death Skill
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings Monks, I too have not found luck in using it against crocs and caiman however I have had no problem using it with bears in the Commons, and it trully
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings Monks,

I too have not found luck in using it against crocs
and caiman however I have had no problem using it with
bears in the Commons, and it trully saved my butt on
the lower lvls of befallen today... it is truly a
priceless skill... oh and mine is only at about 30...

Be well my brothers and sisters, and be sure to ask
monk friends if they are interested in a multiserver
monk guild...

Lenyong,
17th Rank
Bertoxxulous Server

===

Skye Rarius Aria
Tower Keeper
Scarlet_Caste_Tower on Dalnet
